bill_title: Honoring Hayden Joe Schmautz of Fort Pierre for a life of service tragically cut short.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Hayden Joe Schmautz of Fort Pierre for a life of service tragically cut short. WHEREAS, Hayden Joe Schmautz, 19, of Fort Pierre died tragically in a vehicle collision on South Dakota Highway 1804 on November 10, 2023; and WHEREAS, Hayden was already a respected member of the Fort Pierre Volunteer Fire Department; and WHEREAS, Hayden not only served his local community but had also used his training to help fight wildfires in Texas in 2023; and WHEREAS, Hayden's good nature was familiar to everyone in A.B.A.T.E. South Dakota, the Oahe Chapter; Pierre Street Masters car club; Roadhouse Bike Night; and the Fort Pierre Volunteer Fire Department; and WHEREAS, Hayden's way of dispensing kindness with a smile and a hug made others feel seen: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Hayden Joe Schmautz of Fort Pierre had already demonstrated a commitment to service in his brief life, and he leaves behind a legacy of faith, kindness, dedication, and community involvement.
